sentence.Network_en: Botany's focus on the bark of Broussonetia papyrifera.
sentence.Network_cn: 从植物学的观点来看,树皮衣的材料是构树的树皮的部份.

sentence.Network_en: A new variety of Broussonetia ( Moraceae ) from China.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国桑科构树属一新变种.

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To provide a new method for identification of fructus broussonetia from different habitats.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 对不同产地楮实子性状的地域性变异进行分析.
